sentences.en: At bedtime, I take off my clothes and put on my pajamas.
sentences.cn: 睡觉时, 我脱去衣服,换上睡衣.

sentences.en: Go upstairs and get into your pajamas.
He bought a pair of pajamas.
He just got up and was still in pajamas.
sentences.cn: 他刚刚起床,还穿着睡衣.

sentences.en: He threw a coat over his pajamas and ran out into the street.
sentences.cn: 他在睡衣外面披了件大衣就跑到了街上.
他穿着带条纹的睡衣裤.

sentences.en: I have bought the pajamas of yellow colour.
I have two pairs of pajamas.
I like to shop. Do I have clean pajamas, Mother?
sentences.cn: 我喜欢去买东西.我有干净的睡衣吗, 妈妈?

sentences.en: I put on my pajamas and got into bed.
It was a freak of mine to wear pink pajamas.
sentences.cn: 穿上粉红色睡衣是我一时的奇想.

sentences.en: People in pajamas were sucking air between their teeth.
sentences.cn: 一些穿和服的人们呲着牙.

sentences.en: She tried to kick the pajamas loose, but they were tangled in the satin sheet.
sentences.cn: 她想把睡衣踢脱，可是它却和缎子床单绞到了一块。

sentences.en: What a mess! Look at the pajamas strewing on the bed.
sentences.cn: 真是乱七八糟! 看看睡衣乱放在床上.

sentences.en: Yes, we're supposed to go in our pajamas and take a dress.
sentences.cn: 是的, 我们准备各自带上睡衣和一套衣服.
